meanings.sent1: In the school play, the lead role had the highest rankings.
meanings.sent2: The rankings of the chess pieces determine their importance in the game.
meanings.sent3: At the animal shelter, the cat believed it held the top rankings among the pets.
meanings.sent4: The rankings of the planets in our solar system are based on their distance from the sun.
meanings.sent5: The rankings of the ingredients in the recipe are crucial for the dish to turn out well.

meanings.definition: A list of individuals or things in a particular order based on a specific criteria
meanings.sent1: The rankings of the students were displayed on the notice board.
meanings.sent2: The rankings of the songs on the music chart change every week.
meanings.sent3: The rankings of the vegetables in the fridge determined which ones were used first.
meanings.sent4: The rankings of the athletes in the competition were announced at the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The rankings of the books on the bestseller list influenced readers' choices.
